Method.name: Delete
Method.Implementation:
set status = ##class(LTextValue).Delete(id) if $$$ISERR(status) quit status
set status = ..%DeleteId(id,4) if $$$ISERR(status) quit ##class(Dance.Utils.Msg).GetErrorStatus("error_DeleteLocalization", " | "_status)
quit $$$OK

Method.name: SetValues
Method.Implementation:
&sql(DECLARE LangCur CURSOR FOR SELECT ID FROM Dance_Data_Localization.LTextLanguage)
&sql(OPEN LangCur) for { &sql(FETCH LangCur INTO :langId) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set value = ##class(Dance.Data.Localization.LTextValue).GetValue(ltxtId, langId) do ##class(LTextValue).SetValue(value, ..%Id(), langId) }
&sql(CLOSE LangCur)
quit $$$OK
